name: scenario
column3: # selection of the scenario setup

name: nSteps
column3: # number of simulation steps

name: burnIn
column3: # number of burn in time steps

name: burnInTimeFactor
column3: # time factor that increases time speed in

name: omniscientBurnIn
column3: # number of omiscient agent time steps

name: connRadius
column3: # radius within which location cell get connected

name: minFriends
column3: # min number of friends per person

name: maxFriends
column3: # max number of friends per person

name: utilObsError
column3: # observation error to compare utilities

name: mobNewPeriod
column3: # period within a choice is new and not challenged

name: randomCarPropDeviationSTD
column3: # individual random deviation of car properities

name: innoPriority
column3: # weight of priority of innovation [0 0.5]

name: individualPrio
column3: # individual random component of priorities

name: innoWeigPrice
column3: # innoWeigEmmisions = 1 - innoWeigPrice [0 1]

name: innoDevRange
column3: # extend of the area within the innovation distribution

name: radicality
column3: # exponent of the preferences -> high values lead to extreme differences

name: util
column3: # [cobb ces]

name: weightConnections
column3: # flag if connections to friends are weighted

name: reductionFactor
column3: # population reduction factor

name: selfTrust
column3: # how much more a agent values this own opinion
